sentences.en: "He's false, a phoney," Harry muttered.
sentences.cn: “他是冒充的，是个骗子，”哈里咕哝道。

sentences.en: "Thank you," she said with false enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: “谢谢你，”她假装热情地说。

sentences.en: {"GLOSS":["a feeling of being safe when you are not really safe"],"COLLOINEXA":["a false sense of security"]}
sentences.cn: 虚假的安全感

sentences.en: A cheap bed can be a false economy.
sentences.cn: 便宜的床看似省钱，其实可能不然。

sentences.en: a false passport
sentences.cn: 假护照

sentences.en: Evans was trying to obtain a false passport and other documents.
sentences.cn: 埃文斯正试图取得一本假护照和其他证件。

sentences.en: false accusations
sentences.cn: 不实的指责

sentences.en: false assumptions about people of other cultures
sentences.cn: 对来自其他文化的人的错误假设

sentences.en: He knew one false move would end in death.
sentences.cn: 他明白稍有差池就会被置于死地。

sentences.en: He was convicted of filing false income tax returns.
sentences.cn: 他因为在纳税申报表上作假而被定罪。

sentences.en: I can't understand why folks complain about false teeth.
sentences.cn: 我就不明白，人们为什么老是抱怨假牙的问题。

sentences.en: I don’t want to give you any false hopes .
sentences.cn: 我不想让你有任何虚假的希望。

sentences.en: I was wearing false eyelashes and a sweater two sizes too small.
sentences.cn: 我戴着假睫毛，穿着小了两号的毛衣。

sentences.en: In the early seventies I wore false eyelashes, as was the fashion.
sentences.cn: 70年代初我戴假睫毛，这在当时是时尚。

sentences.en: It seems a false economy to me to cut down on libraries.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，减少图书馆的数量并不是真正的节约。

sentences.en: Look at the false police reports that omitted or misstated crucial facts.
sentences.cn: 看看这份失实的警方报告吧，它忽略或歪曲了关键的事实。

sentences.en: Lulled into a false sense of security, we eagerly awaited their return.
sentences.cn: 我们被一种虚假的安全感所麻痹，急切地等着他们回来。

sentences.en: One false move and I knew Sarah would be dead.
sentences.cn: 我知道萨拉一失足就会没命了。

sentences.en: Please decide whether the following statements are true or false .
sentences.cn: 请判断以下说法的对错。

sentences.en: The patient was registered under a false name.
sentences.cn: 那位患者挂号时用了假名。

sentences.en: The programme seemed false and sugary, and the characters smug.
sentences.cn: 这个节目看起来矫揉造作，而其中的人物还自我感觉良好。

sentences.en: The statement gives us a false impression that we understand something when we do not.
sentences.cn: 这句话使我们产生错觉，以为自己懂了，但其实并没懂。

words.tran_cn: 说谎；假话；不真实；错误的信仰
伪造；歪曲；[审计] 篡改；证明是假
[法] 伪造者；伪证的人；撒谎的人
伪造；篡改；歪曲；证明...虚假

phrases.tran_cn: 假警报；引起一场空喜欢的人
火灾误报率；误警率；虚率
n. （船只，箱子，抽屉等夹层的）假底，活底
假语句；假命题；不实报表；虚假声明
n. 失足；摔倒；愚蠢的行为

trans.tran_cn: 虚伪的，不正的，非法的，假造的，摹造的，临时的
trans.tran_en: based on incorrect information or ideas
